name: Super Shotgun Survival
description:
Follow me on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/AndreasLidell

Controls:

Move with arrow keys and shoot with Z.

Strafe:
Hold down Z to keep firing in that direction while moving in another!

Fullscreen only works if you've downloaded the game.

Gamepad controls:

Left analog stick to move

A to shoot.
Back/select to go back.

(Not all gamepads are supported, I tested with a wired xbox 360 controller which works perfectly on my end)

Info:

This game was originally made in 24 hours (that version is still available for download) but I have since gone back and updated the game and added a lot of new features and fixes!

For let's players:

Download the 1080p version (labeled Super Shotgun Survival v1.11 -1080p) for best video quality!
